trans-unit.source: Converts objects to and from a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Converte oggetti a e da <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.

trans-unit.source: Initializes a new instance of the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> class.
trans-unit.target: Inizializza una nuova istanza della classe <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che fornisce un contesto del formato.

trans-unit.source: The type to convert from.
trans-unit.target: Tipo da cui eseguire la conversione.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> can convert an object of the specified type to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />, using the specified context.
trans-unit.target: Determina se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> può convertire l'oggetto del tipo specificato in un <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> utilizzando il contesto specificato.

trans-unit.source: true if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> can convert the specified type to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />; otherwise, false.
trans-unit.target: true se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> può convertire il tipo specificato in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />; in caso contrario, false.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter> can convert the following types to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength>:
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter> possibile convertire i tipi seguenti di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength>:

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che fornisce un contesto del formato.

trans-unit.source: The type to convert to.
trans-unit.target: Tipo in cui eseguire la conversione.

trans-unit.source: Determines whether the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> can convert a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> to the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Determina se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> può convertire <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> nel tipo specificato.

trans-unit.source: <see langword="true" /> if the <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> can convert a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> to the specified type; otherwise, <see langword="false" />.
trans-unit.target: <see langword="true" /> se <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter" /> può convertire <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> nel tipo specifico; in caso contrario, <see langword="false" />.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> method returns `true` if `destinationType` is <xref:System.String> or <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor>.
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> restituisce `true` se `destinationType` è <xref:System.String> o <xref:System.ComponentModel.Design.Serialization.InstanceDescriptor>.

trans-unit.source: Otherwise, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> returns `false`.
trans-unit.target: In caso contrario, <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> restituisce `false`.

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che fornisce un contesto del formato.

trans-unit.source: An object that provides the culture information that is used during conversion.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che fornisce informazioni sulle impostazioni cultura utilizzate durante la conversione.

trans-unit.source: The object to convert to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto da convertire in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified object to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.
trans-unit.target: Converte l'oggetto specificato in un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.

trans-unit.source: The converted object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto convertito.

trans-unit.source: The <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter> can convert the following types to a <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength>:
trans-unit.target: Il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter> possibile convertire i tipi seguenti di un <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength>:

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> method before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> to avoid throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertFrom%2A> metodo prima di chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> per evitare di generare un'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="source" /> è <see langword="null" />.
--oppure--

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="source" /> cannot be converted to a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.
trans-unit.target: L'elemento <paramref name="source" /> non può essere convertito in <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.

trans-unit.source: An object that provides a format context.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che fornisce un contesto del formato.

trans-unit.source: An object that provides the culture information that is used during conversion.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto che fornisce informazioni sulle impostazioni cultura utilizzate durante la conversione.

trans-unit.source: A <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> to convert to another type.
trans-unit.target: <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> per la conversione a un altro tipo.

trans-unit.source: The type to convert to.
trans-unit.target: Tipo in cui eseguire la conversione.

trans-unit.source: Converts the specified <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> to an object of the specified type.
trans-unit.target: Converte l'oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" /> specificato in un oggetto del tipo specificato.

trans-unit.source: The converted object.
trans-unit.target: Oggetto convertito.

trans-unit.source: Call the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> method before calling the <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> to avoid throwing an exception.
trans-unit.target: Chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.CanConvertTo%2A> metodo prima di chiamare il <xref:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLengthConverter.ConvertFrom%2A> per evitare di generare un'eccezione.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="destinationType" /> is <paramref name="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="destinationType" /> è <paramref name="null" />.

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is <see langword="null" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> è <see langword="null" />.
--oppure--

trans-unit.source: <paramref name="value" /> is not a <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.
trans-unit.target: <paramref name="value" /> non è un oggetto <see cref="T:System.Windows.Controls.VirtualizationCacheLength" />.
